mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_todo ( iplant, ctnt, deadline, repeatYn, repeatDay ) VALUES ( #{iplant}, #{ctnt}, #{deadline}, #{repeatYn}, #{repeatDay} )
mapper.select: SELECT itodo, ctnt, deadline, finish_yn FROM p_todo WHERE del_yn = 0 ORDER BY deadline
SELECT itodo, ctnt, deadline, finish_yn FROM p_todo WHERE DATE_FORMAT(deadline, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{deadline} AND del_yn = 0
